headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About Builders FirstSource (BLDR): Should You Buy?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Builders FirstSource (BLDR) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: Insiders Pour Millions into These 3 Stocks — Here’s Why They Draw Plaudits Across the Board
summary: There are many strategies investors can use in order to get the best out of a portfolio and one involves following the moves of the insiders. By insiders, we mean the corporate officers, the top-level executives and Board members who are responsible for bringing company profits and sending returns to shareholders. Their roles give them valuable insights into the inner workings of their firms, and also give them early access to information that will impact share prices. So, when the insiders star
